environment_variables.SPACK_DEPENDENCIES: ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % gcc@10.2.0) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^fftw@3.3.10/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' fftw@3.3.10 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi ~openmp) ^boost@1.77.0/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' boost@1.77.0 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi +numpy)  ^cmake@3.21.4/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cmake@3.21.4 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
environment_variables.SPACK_SPEC: arrayfire@3.7.3 % gcc@10.2.0 +cuda cuda_arch=60,75,80,86 ~forge ~ipo ~opencl ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % gcc@10.2.0) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^fftw@3.3.10/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' fftw@3.3.10 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi ~openmp) ^boost@1.77.0/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' boost@1.77.0 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi +numpy)
